tub.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a small container made of paper or plastic with a lid, in which food is bought or stored
tub.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: an open container that is usually round, used for washing, storing things in etc
tub.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: the amount of liquid, food etc that a tub can contain
tub.translation[0].definitions[2].exampl: We ate a tub of ice cream.
tub.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: a large container in which you sit to wash yourself
tub.translation[0].definitions[3].exampl: I had a long soak in the tub.
tub.translation[0].definitions[4].defini: an old boat that travels slowly
